)

update PHIP_ORG_BASE_INFO
TYPE = #{item.type,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CATALOG_ID = #{item.catalogId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CODE = #{item.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_NAME = #{item.orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESS = #{item.address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TELECOM = #{item.telecom,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EFFECTIVE_TIME_LOW = #{item.effectiveTimeLow,jdbcType=DATE},
EFFECTIVE_TIME_HIGH = #{item.effectiveTimeHigh,jdbcType=DATE},
DEPARTMENT_NAME = #{item.departmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARENT_ID = #{item.parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APPLICANT_ID = #{item.applicantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATE = #{item.state,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REPRESENTATIVE = #{item.representative,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LICENSE = #{item.license,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHARGE = #{item.charge,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHARGE_PHONE = #{item.chargePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AGENCY_CODE = #{item.agencyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GOV_ID = #{item.govId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZIP_CODE = #{item.zipCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BED = #{item.bed,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PUBLIC_KEY = #{item.publicKey,jdbcType=BLOB},
WEB = #{item.web,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMAIL = #{item.email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHORT_NAME = #{item.shortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NOTICE = #{item.notice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REGISTE_PHONE = #{item.registePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where id = #{item.id};
